content: कृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कृ-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Doing, manufacturing, making, performing. {@--2@} Action, deed. {@--3@} Creation, work, composition; (तौ) स्वकृतिं गापयामास कविप्रथमपद्धतिं <ls>R. 15. 33</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">64</ls>, <ls n="R. 15.">69</ls>; <ls>N. 22. 155.</ls> {@--4@} Magic, enchantment. {@--5@} Injuring, killing. {@--6@} The number ‘20’ {@--7@} An enchantress, a witch. {@--8@} A knife. {@--9@} Way-laying; hurting, injuring (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
